FontString.text: Notify me when someone is debuffed with selected
Notify when a buff you can cast has faded
Note that both class and group must fit the requirements

FontString.name: $parentPlayerInfo
FontString.text: Sets the scale of raid windows.

FontString.name: $parentThresholdInfo
FontString.text: Displays up to 5 health bars of the party/raid members with the lowest health.

FontString.name: $parentInfo
FontString.text: Changes the health and mana bars' background opacity.

FontString.name: $parentName
FontString.text: Health and Mana Bars' Background Opacity

FontString.name: $parentInfo
FontString.text: Sets the full health / out of range alpha of the frames.

FontString.name: $parentRangeText
FontString.text: Use alpha to indicate out of range (instead of healthiness)

Scripts.OnShow: _G[self:GetName() .. "Delete"]:SetText("Are you sure you want to delete\n'|c00FFFFFF" .. self.name .. "|r'?"); PlaySound(1115);
